name: Smart Home
body:
## Raspberry PI / Ionic / Java - Home Automation

## Hello,

## This page demonstrate how $45 credit card size computer change your home to Smart Home.

### Things you need

* Raspberry Pi 2 or B+ board with atleast 8 GB storage
* Magnetic switch
* IP camera
* 8 channel relay board
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
